hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #House of Twins#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.
hinted_locations: KF GS Know It All House

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Treasure Box Shop#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Heart Container#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Side Room Near Lower Lizalfos

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #5# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Damp's Hut#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Gerudo Card#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Child Climb South Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ice Cavern Compass# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.
